docs.snippet: Strong ratings for Sunday’s Patriots-Seahawks and Cowboys-Steelers games provide hope in an N.F.L. season that has seen prime-time viewership plummet....
docs.lead_paragraph: Strong ratings for Sunday’s Patriots-Seahawks and Cowboys-Steelers games provide hope in an N.F.L. season that has seen prime-time viewership plummet.
docs.abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column considers whether NFL can recover from its significant television ratings slump this season, now that World Series and presidential election are over.

headline.main: NBC Takes Over Thursday Night Football Amid Promising Signs in TV Ratings

docs.snippet: A firearms retailer in Harrison, N.Y., has drawn protest by residents who object to its location near a school, though no laws prevent it from opening there....
docs.lead_paragraph: A firearms retailer in Harrison, N.Y., has drawn protest by residents who object to its location near a school, though no laws prevent it from opening there.
docs.abstract: Louis Zacchio's decision to open gun shop L&L Sports in Harrison, NY, has provoked uproar among residents, with 3,300 signing petition objecting to store's location; firearms are particularly sensitive in community close to Newtown, Conn, where 26 people, including 20 schoolchildren, were killed in 2012 shooting rampage.

headline.main: Westchester County Gets a New Gun Store, and a Battle of Ideas
headline.print_headline: Westchester Gets a New Gun Store, and a Battle of Ideas

docs.snippet: Mazda Motor Corp will recall about 70,000 of its RX-8 sports cars from model years 2004 to 2008 in the United States because of an issue with fuel pump sealing rings that may leak and catch fire, U.S. safety regulators said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mazda Motor Corp will recall about 70,000 of its RX-8 sports cars from model years 2004 to 2008 in the United States because of an issue with fuel pump sealing rings that may leak and catch fire, U.S. safety regulators said on Tuesday.
